developer_registration.reason_fillout: To avoid longer waiting time until your account is validated please fill out contact person and purpose of registration carefully such that an administrator may decide quickly about your access request.

developer_testusers.title: Test Users
developer_testusers.empty: There are no test users registered for this account.
developer_testusers.description: Using these buttons you can register additional users for testing your applications. Using test users, plugins are run locally (from 'localhost') and not on the server.

developer_yourapps.title: Your Applications
developer_yourapps.empty: You have not registered any application yet.
developer_yourapps.name: Name

appmessages.title: Predefined Messages for Application:
appmessages.empty: There are no application specfic messages defined yet.

reasons.REGISTRATION_BY_OTHER_PERSON: Registration of a new user by someone else
reasons.FIRSTUSE_EXISTINGUSER: First use of application (if no registration email sent)
reasons.EMAIL_CHANGED_OLDADDRESS: Login email changed (send to old email address)
reasons.EMAIL_CHANGED_NEWADDRESS: Login email changed (send to new email address)

manageapp.edit_help: Change the setup for your application.
manageapp.query_help: Define which types of data your application may access.
manageapp.subscriptions_help: Define triggers that cause an action on the @PLATFORM server
manageapp.tokenExchangeParams: OAuth 2 Parameters for the Token Exchange
manageapp.testfromlocal_help: During development, you can test the plugin code stored on your local computer on this instance.
manageapp.serverimport_help: If your plugin offers automatic import, you can test the script of your plugin that is normally run on the server on your local computer.
manageapp.link_btn: Links with research projects or external parties
manageapp.link_help: Applications may suggest or require participation in a research project. Research projects may recommend the use of applications. Use of the application may require a user's consent to healthcare professionals or teams to view their data.
manageapp.repository_help: Checkout the newest version of your code
manageapp.icon_help: Upload and manage the icons and images to be used with your application. Provide images for the login screen, the consent acceptation screen, the store, etc.
manageapp.messages_help: Provide your own email texts sent to new user accounts, on first use of your application, for accepting consents and more.
manageapp.stats_help: View statistics and hints for improvements about the various types of API calls your application sends to the server.
manageapp.debug_help: Login as application and test queries against the @PLATFORM backend.
manageapp.applicence_help: Does the user require a license to use this application?
manageapp.admin_only: Only an administrator may change this section. Please request changes if required.
manageapp.logout_explain: Changes to fields marked with !! will require to log out all users of that application.

info.filename: This name is internally used to identify your application. Should be a valid identifier (a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _).
info.targetUserRole: Is your application for a specific role only? Otherwise choose 'Any Role'.
info.type: Choose 'Plugin' if your application will run on the @PLATFORM portal. Choose 'Application (Smartphone, Web)' for an external application. Choose 'Service' for a server-side only script. Choose 'OAuth 1' or 'OAuth 2' if you need to connect to an external server using OAuth 1 or OAuth 2.
info.name: The name of your application that will be presented to the end user.
info.description: The description of your application that will be shown on the Marketplace.
info.tokenExchangeParams: Default is client_id=<client_id>&grant_type=<grant_type>&code=<code>&redirect_uri=<redirect_uri> but some services also require client_secret=<client_secret> or no client_id
info.no_update_history: FHIR resource updates done by this application produce no history entries. Use only if application does many and frequent updates.
info.pseudonymize: Read pseudonymized data. Does not update records from participants.
info.resharesData: Application is allowed to reshare data it has access to to 3rd party.
info.allowsUserSearch: Users of the application are allowed to search for other users of the same application.
info.consentObserving: Does this service monitor user consents? Add 'Consents' to the Access Filter in order to activate.
info.defaultSpaceName: Title of the tile for your plugin on the dashboard.
info.tags: Categories on the Store for which your plugin should be listed.
info.url: URL of your plugins main page. If you use the template from @PLATFORM it is 'dist/index.html#!?authToken=:authToken''
info.previewUrl: URL of your plugins dashboard tile. Leave empty if you do not provide such a tile.
info.defaultSpaceContext: Choose 'Dashboard' for the default dashboard. Choose 'Config' if you write an import plugin.
info.redirectUri: You may specifiy multiple possible redirect URIs by separating the URIs with a space.
info.secret: Your application will need this 'secret' during login. Choose whatever you like.
info.mustParticipateInStudy: Users must participate in research project in order to use this application.
info.unlock_code: If filled out, this code must be entered by the user in order to sign up or log in the first time to the @PLATFORM using the application. The code is not case sensitive.
info.send_reports: Notify developer ({{user}}) by email on errors caused by this application.
info.developerTeam: Enter comma separated list of email addresses of other developers on @PLATFORM that develop this application.

status.title: Application Status
status.DEVELOPMENT: Under development - to be used by developer only
status.DEPRECATED: Deprecated - should no longer be used

manageapp.nostudy: Not linked to a research project
manageapp.queryeditor_btn: Go to the Data Access Filter editor
manageapp.usagestats_help: Analyze the usage frequency of the application.
manageapp.export_help: Export the definition of this application, so that it can be imported and used on another server.
manageapp.logoutwarning: Changing the application definition will log out all users from that application. They will have to confirm the use of the application again on next login.
manageapp.researchwarning: Changing the application definition will unlink this research application from all projects!
manageapp.creator: Creator

appstats.title: Debug Information for
appstats.run: Number of times the action has been invoked.
appstats.retry: Number of times operations had to be repeated because of concurrency issues.
appstats.db: Average number of internal database (MongoDB) queries executed per action invocation.
appstats.empty: No information has been recorded since debug information was last cleared.

appicon.title: Icons and Images
appicon.name: Application Name
appicon.file_help: Please resize and compress the image to a reasonable size before upload. Images larger than 1 MB will not be accepted.

applink.title: Links with research projects, external services or health professionals
applink.terms_of_use_hint: If special terms of use have to be read and accepted by the user, please send the text to @OPERATOR. We will upload the text in the correct format and provide you with the identifier you need to enter here.

types.OFFER_EXTRA_PAGE: Onboarding: Consent is offered on a separate page.
types.OFFER_INLINE_AGB: Onboarding: Use terms of use as description.

appsubscriptions.title: Default Subscriptions
appsubscriptions.empty: There are no default subscriptions defined.

debug.title: Test your backend code on your computer
debug.description: You can test your server-side subscription processing code on your local computer.
debug.description2: Download the subscription tester and run it with the given connection code.
debug.description3: This works only with your developer account or any account created using your developer account and only as long as the application is in development.
debug.cmd_to_run: Command to run on your computer:

appreviews.title: Application Reviews
appreviews.name: Application Name
appreviews.noreviews: No reviews have been done yet on this instance.

repository.title: Code Repository
repository.phase_provided: The repository needs to be provided

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.add_something: Please add an app or a project you are working on. You may also add a test user.
workspace.testusers_only: Use only with test accounts! Plain text password will be stored in your browser!

warning.app_deprecated: App is deprecated and should not be used.
warning.no_orgname: No developer organization name specified in app definition.
warning.no_publisher: No publisher specified in app definition.
warning.not_spotlighted: Plugin is not available in Midata store. Ask an admin.
warning.no_send_reports: Error report notifications (emails) are disabled for this app.
warning.has_comments: Comments available in the error and performance statistics.
warning.project_not_validated: Project has not been validated yet.
warning.no_user_for_app: None of the test accounts use the application
warning.no_user_for_project: None of test accounts participate to the project
warning.appinstance_outdated: App version is newer than app. consent. Needs reconfirm.

error.no_tags: No tags for app selected. Plugin cannot be added by user.
error.no_url: Plugin does not have initial URL
error.never_deployed: Plugin has repository information but had never been checked out successful.
error.no_access_filter: No access filter provided for application
error.no_join_method: Project has no join methods selected.
error.project_in_validation: Project is currently validated by an administrator.
error.project_no_groups: No participant groups defined for project.

info.project_not_running: Project has not been started yet.
